Package org.universAAL.ontology.security

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessRight  
    AccessType
    The different Access types for AccessRights.
    Anonymizable
    Any anonymizable resource should be subclass of this class to enable the anonymization service to encrypt the Anonymizable.PROP_ANNONYMOUS_RESOURCE property reference.
    AnonymizationService
    Service Description for Authentication.
    Asset  
    AuthenticationService
    Service Description for Authentication.
    AuthorizationService
    Service Description for Authorisadtion.
    Credentials
    Upper Credentials information Concept.
    DelegationForm
    Delegation Form is a SignedResource, signed by the Authoriser enabling the Delegate to perform some Competences in the form of Roles.
    DeviceBoundSession
    Device Bound Session, a session that is only valid for a specific device.
    Factor  
    InherenceFactor  
    KnowledgeFactor  
    LocationBoundSession
    Location bound Session, a session that is only valid within a location.
    MultifactorCredentials
    Multifactor type Credentials.
    OneTimePassword  
    Password  
    PossessionFactor  
    Role  
    RoleManagementService
    Service Description for Authorisadtion.
    SecurityOntology  
    SecuritySubprofile
    Security Subprofile to store Credentials, Roles, AccessRights ...
    Session
    Upper Session concept.
    SessionManagementService
    Service Description for checking validity of Sessions.
    UserPasswordCredentials
    User-Password type Credentials.
